"A Kind of Gratitude":
"We're going to subdue a Caterdra'n.
Would you like to come with us?
This mission will be rather tough.
Saika Hyouri doesn't want to invite Ignis
or the others.
Taking on a tough mission by himself as a
way to atone... Isn't that just like him?
That said, let's go as a trio this time.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Elder Pain and Saika Hyouri"

"Elder Pain-NT+35
※Once per account, given upon completion."
